tool_description: Manages browser cookies and sessions including setting, getting, deleting cookies, and session state management for authentication testing.

action.description: Cookie action (set, get, delete, clear_all, export_session, import_session)

cookie_name.description: Name of specific cookie (required for set, get, delete actions)

cookie_value.description: Value of cookie (required for set action)

domain.description: Domain for cookie (optional for set action)

path.description: Path for cookie (optional for set action)

expires.description: Expiration time in ISO format (optional for set action)

session_data.description: JSON string of session data (required for import_session)

error_messages: Invalid action: Must be one of set, get, delete, clear_all, export_session, import_session
Cookie name required: cookie_name is required for set, get, and delete actions
Cookie value required: cookie_value is required for set action
Invalid expiration format: expires must be in valid ISO date-time format
Cookie not found: No cookie exists with the specified name
Invalid session data: session_data must be valid JSON string for import action
Cookie operation failed: Unable to complete cookie operation
usage: Provide action type and relevant parameters based on the action. For set action, provide cookie_name and cookie_value. For get/delete, provide cookie_name. For import_session, provide session_data. The tool manages cookies and returns operation results.

operation_success.description: Whether the cookie operation was successful

cookie_data.description: Cookie data or session information based on action

cookies_count.description: Number of cookies affected by the operation
